text: William Royce "Boz" Scaggs (born June 8, 1944) is an American singer- songwriter, and guitarist. He became known for his series of albums in the late 1970s, and songs "Lido Shuffle" and "Lowdown" from Silk Degrees (1976). They peaked at No. 2 on the Billboard 200. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American rock singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:American soul singers Category:American soul musicians Category:American blues singers Category:American blues musicians Category:American jazz singers Category:American jazz musicians Category:Singers from Ohio Category:Singers from Texas Category:Musicians from Texas Category:People from Plano, Texas Category:Musicians from Canton, Ohio
title: Boz Scaggs
